tagline: On one site there exists many good PHP tools such as PHPUnit or PHP CodeSniffer which support the development of PHP scripts. On the other side there powerful IDEs for example PHP Delepment Tools Project (PDT) but mostly with no possibility to use such tools with them. The Eclipse PHP Tool Integration (PTI) is a collection of Eclipse plugins which aims to close this gap.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: PHP Tool Integration
body:
### Documentation
The documentation can be found at [the wiki of this project](https://github.com/PHPsrc/PHP-Tool-Integration/wiki).

### Update Site
* Stable: http://www.phpsrc.org/eclipse/pti/
* Development: http://www.phpsrc.org/eclipse/pti-dev/

Need help? See [installation guide](://github.com/PHPsrc/PHP-Tool-Integration/wiki/Installation).

### Contact
Mail: pti@phpsrc.org
Twitter: http://twitter.com/svenkiera
